TITLE: Software Developer

CONCORDIA.DESC: Co-op Bachelor of Software Engineering. Graduated with distinction. Cumulative GPA 3.78.

DIABLOS.DESC: Quarterback coach in my hometown football team for the Diablos La Prairie Bantam AAA team. My goals are to make sure that the children are able to reconcile competitive sports and school. A football player has to be dedicated, respectful, organized, perseverent, and much more. That is, our role as football coach, is to lead children to achieve these goals on a football field, and in their personal life. Also, it is to provide a secure environment for football players to enjoy their favorite sport without serious injuries.

HABITAT.DESC: Founded in 1985, Habitat for Humanity Canada is a national, nonprofit organization working toward a world where everyone has a decent and affordable place to call home.

MISSION.DESC: Established in 1892, Welcome Hall Mission has become the largest doorway to help for Montrealers in need. Many programs are available to support the homeless, young single mothers, families and at-risk youth. Providing hope through concrete actions and effective solutions.

WORK.DESCRIPTION: Senior software developer at Shopify helping merchants engage with their customers. Let's make commerce better for everyone!
Software developer at Shopify helping merchants engage with their customers. Let's make commerce better for everyone!
Lead and manage the insights team's projects. Provide the team with a vision, goals and milestones. Take an active part in the development process of the team's tools.
Building creative, interactive and responsive web applications to fulfill end-users needs. Ansible, React, Python, Angular, Nodejs are my most used languages and tools.
As part-time employee, I mentored new interns in the team in their respective projects. Highly developed my leadership and organizational skills.

Development of responsive and real-time web applications with Angular, React, Node.js and Web Sockets for post trade analysis. Built all layers of an application from the ground up. Enhanced my knowledge of Node.js, Angular and SQL and ASP framework.
QA testing and support on various applications of the team. Development of frontend dashboards using d3.js library. Experience with organization and prioritization of end-user requests.

Maintain and develop features for an Intranet developed in ASP.Net Web Forms for QA metrics. Developped and enhanced my C# and Javascript skills. TDD was the approach taken in the team. Acquired knowledge of testing with NUnit and Selenium.

Introduction to various web technologies such as REST APIs and ASPX Server Side controls. The internship consisted mostly in SharePoint 2013 development of an Intranet. Frontend interactions were vanillaJS and jQuery.

ABOUT:
Highly motivated Software Developer graduated from Concordia University in 2017 and a Javascript enthousiast. Always seeking for learning opportunities and new challenges. Passionate about technologies and how to integrate them in a real-world example. I have experience in all the application life cycle from eliciting requirements and planning to testing.

Experienced web developer using a multitude of tools and frameworks such as Angular, React, Node.js, Python, Docker and Ansible. I love to solve complex problems with easy, reusable and maintainable solutions. Test Driven Development is an approach I try to conform to.

Don't hesitate to reach out to me!
